items.content_html: The new Sevendust album is very, very good.
You would never guess it‚Äôs August in Seattle based on this weather. But, here we are.
New post from jsorge.net: The Ultimate Guide to iOS Notification Lifecycles
I have no idea how my boys can run around barefoot on our wood chips. They don‚Äôt care one bit!
Over the weekend I added support for drafts to Maverick. Today I was prompted to use it. It‚Äôs so cool to have full control over my website.
Dang, it‚Äôs a huge pain to implement Micropub posting via JSON in Swift.
We had a great time out at the VMAC for Seahawks training camp. The boys did amazingly well sitting on the berm and watching practice, and it‚Äôs a beautiful day. God is good!

Walked by the Apple Store at Alderwood Mall (which has been closed for renovation since the end of February) and holy cow it‚Äôs going to be huge when they reopen! I think they expended left and right, probably tripling the store size!

I‚Äôm making really good progress in firming up Micropub support in Maverick. I‚Äôve got all green on creating posts from form encoded requests on micropub.rocks.

On to JSON!

Achievement unlocked: Filed my first Swift bug today, then closed it when I found the resolution. Turns out the swift-tools-version being 4.0 doesn‚Äôt work on Mojave. Upping to 4.1 gets it working. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Seeing posters for the upcoming Pearl Jam shows at Safeco Field is really getting me pumped to go.
Some days call for packing up the family and going to Ikea.
New post from jsorge.net: Securing an nginx Container with letsencrypt

I can‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs already been seven years that‚Äôs Emily and I have been married. For our anniversary yesterday we had a nice dinner at the Edgewater and then went to the Chihuly blown glass museum. A great night with my love.
New post from jsorge.net: Nerd Snipe- 2 Apps, 1 Extension
I think I just got my craziest build script to work. üéâ

I‚Äôve been working on my shell scripting skills to make a Maverick site really easy to setup. It feels way less fiddly now than it did a couple of days ago. I‚Äôm no wizard at these things but hopefully getting better.
I put up a repo template that anyone could use to make their own site based on my Maverick textbundle engine. Check it out! github.com/jsorge/ma‚Ä¶

Atticus knows exactly where the Hot Wheels are kept at Fred Meyer. I took him and Finnian around the store while Emily got groceries and he led us right there. I don‚Äôt know if we can ever go there anymore and not bring home at least 2 new cars.
A friend gave us some bourbon soaked cherries for cocktails. I must say they go amazingly well in an old fashioned.
Red velvet cake (especially frozen) is the best cake. Come at me.
New post from jsorge.net: Finny Turns 2
I was not expecting this day to start out with 2 new tires on our van.
New post from jsorge.net: This is My New Site; It Looks Like The Old Site

I‚Äôve written over 1100 words about my Maverick building and deployment process and feel like there‚Äôs so much left to say. Maybe I should split this up into a few parts. It‚Äôs too late tonight and I need to get to bed. Eventually I‚Äôll publish a post on this new blog system of mine!
